Body: Description: Could we Copy files to a USB from one one EY MAC machine and try to access it from another EY MAC machine

What We've Learned Updated: As per description customer wants to copy files to a USB from one  EY MAC machine and try to access it from another EY MAC machine.
 

NOTE!!!!This is a special account. They do not communicate with support for NDC
Copied to email Paul Trufanoff Paul.Trufanoff@netwrix.com and Alexey Mordovsky Alexey.Mordovsky@netwrix.com

Next Steps Updated: requesting customer for below:

For me to be able to help accordingly, please confirm if this query is related to NDC for which this ticket was opened and share below information.
 
1. What files do you want to copy from NDC? (please share a full screen screenshot)
2. May I know why do you want to copy the files? What is the final goal?
 
Please provide as many details as possible so I could fully understand your situation and respond to your query accordingly.
